name: Help & Manual Compressed Project
summary: Learn about .HMXZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HMXZ projects are used for creating various kinds of help documentation and technical manuals. They can be exported to several different help formats, including Winhelp (.HLP), HTML Help (.CHM), and the .EPUB eBook format.
The other Help & Manual project format (.HMXP files) also uses XML formatting for the project file, but it does not save all the files in the same Zip archive.
NOTE: HMXZ and HMXP files were introduced with Help & Manual version 5.

description: Help documentation project created by Help & Manual technical documentation software; contains help content, including help page text, images, and formatting; stores all files, including the XML project file, as a compressed .ZIP archive.
